name: Multiplayer Call of Duty
description:
I made a multiplayer online Call of Duty game. You can host a server then shoot people on the opposite team. First team to 5 kills wins. There's also bombs you can detonate and a flamethrower.
Check out the read-me in the game's folder to see the controls and how to host a game.

Want to see how I made this game? Check it out here:

Also feel free to check out my YouTube channel for more videos and games:

https://www.youtube.com/TylerGreen
